extendedInfo.description: Achievement checklist for Need for Speed: Most Wanted on the Xbox 360, to keep track of your progress towards 1280 gamer points.. All 60 Achievements included. This includes the Ultimate Speed Pack, Terminal Velocity, Movies Legends and Hero DLC Achievements.. Descriptions for all 60 Achievements. Your achievement progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your achievement progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Achievement description is shown when a row is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Electronic Arts or Criterion Games.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good tracker would like to see Xbl integrated into it
reviews.author: A Google User
